0.name: Alfred
0.text: Wow! That canary is singing Laura's baby.

1.name: Alfred
1.text: Will you return her baby to her?

3.name: Alfred
3.text: Now you just have to find her.

4.name: Alfred
4.text: If I remember correctly, Laura lives in one of the white bird houses.

5.name: Alfred
5.text: You can't just keep it as a pet!
